newsitem.title: USA: Bear Stearns files $5 bln shelf offering.
newsitem.headline: Bear Stearns files $5 bln shelf offering.

text.p: Bear Stearns Companies Inc filed Tuesday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to register a shelf offering of up to $5 billion in debt securities and warrants.
When added with previously registered securities, the company's shelf offering totals $5,797,670,162.
Proceeds from the sale will be used for general corporate purposes, which may include repaying outstanding short-term debt.
The company's underwriting unit, Bear Stearns & Co Inc, was named as underwriter for the shelf offering.
